backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko canister defining an empty actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking camera-related feature requirements to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, dark-mode themes, and base element styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/components/AudioStateCue.ts: Maps processing states to predefined messages for parent-driven audio announcements.
frontend/src/components/CameraPreview.ts: Full camera preview component handling permission checks, startup fallback logic, blank-preview detection, error mapping, capture, and retry flows.
frontend/src/components/CameraStartupFal: UI overlay prompting the user to manually start the camera when automatic startup fails.
frontend/src/components/LiveAnnouncer.ts: Screen-reader live region component announcing status messages when they change.
frontend/src/components/OrientationPromp: Full-screen prompt instructing users to rotate their device to portrait orientation with associated screen-reader announcement.
frontend/src/components/PlaybackControls: Accessible playback control buttons for pause/resume, repeat, and speech-rate adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCameraPermission.t: Provides a hook to check and track camera permission state using the Permissions API with fallbacks.
frontend/src/hooks/useCaptureHaptics.ts: Adds a simple vibration helper for capture feedback using the browser's vibrate API.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication, exposing identity, login, and logout state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnDeviceOcr.ts: Loads Tesseract.js on demand and provides a hook to run on-device OCR on images with processing and error states.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrientation.ts: Detects portrait vs landscape orientation by monitoring window size changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder since no backend queries are used.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Wraps the Web Speech API to provide speech playback control, rate adjustment, and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and high-contrast accessible theme variables with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Main screen that captures images, runs OCR, announces states, and manages text-to-speech playback with accessibility features.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, container settings, extended color system using CSS variables, custom animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: JSON describing project metadata for an Android OCR-to-speech app, including architecture notes, known camera issues, and a list of existing accessibility-focused features.
